description: The robot's gripper grasps the Pringles can around its cylindrical body, performing a Power:Large Diameter grasp to handle it.
contact_details: The robot's gripper is grasping the Pringles can around its cylindrical body. The gripper appears to be a two-fingered parallel gripper, with one finger on each side of the can. The fingers are positioned roughly in the middle of the can's height.
